name: Sheikh Hassan
comment: Such an awesome and amazing place for renting luxury cars. I rented twice. Affordable and reasonable prices. Remarkable service of delivery and return. Dealing with customer is superb. Summarizing all I must say BEST PEOPLE WITH BEST SERVICE.

name: Jehad
comment: Great service and awesome people .. Muntasser was super nice and very helpful. The person on whatsapp sent me everything about my contract and contacted me for my info to return my deposite. And I got it on time. I will defnitly get cars from them next time I visit Dubai.

name: Hassan Ureibi
comment: One of the best car rental services i have experienced. Really nice cars for good prices and professional service. Muntasir is the guy we coordinated with and he made it so easy, for renting, and returning. Even proposed that we get the car already at the airport and return it there. Much recommended

name: Jahangir Alam
comment: Amazing 5* Service ! The team saved my Holiday!!!! (another company let me down ! ) these guys available 24 hours !! Within 2 hours from contacting them they meet me with the car + amazing price ! Hassle Free, Clear Transparent, Great Communication! The best in Dubai !!

name: Saad Khan
comment: They provide amazing car rent services with delivery and return on time. Specially, sanitization of cars and cleanliness followed by them on priority.

name: John Valmonte
comment: I borrowed car from them, it was perfectly clean. Good car and service

name: Jake Peraren
comment: I have always used Lux Motors to rent a car whenever I am in dubai. Very accomodating and provides the best cars in dubai. I definitely recommend to use them whenever in dubai.
